contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox automobile |image =Opel Movano B front 20100705.jpg |name =Opel Movano |manufacturer =[[Opel]] |related =[[Renault Master]] |aka = Vauxhall Movano (United Kingdom) |production =1997–present |class = [[Light commercial vehicle]] - [[van]] |predecessor = }} The '''Opel Movano''', also known as the '''Vauxhall Movano''' in the [[United Kingdom]], is an upper-medium size [[Van|van]] produced by the [[Germany|German]] manufacturer [[Opel]] since 1997, now in its Second generation. It is a [[badge engineering|badge-engineered]] the second and third generation [[Renault Master]] since the First generation model was too old (presented in 1980). The Second generation Movano was launched in 2010, has been available with single/twin rear wheel drive. ==External links== *[http://www.opel.ie/vehicles/opel_range/vans/movano-ng/index.html Opel Movano official site] == References == {{Commons category}} {{Reflist}} {{Opel}} {{Opel timeline}} {{Vauxhall Motors}} [[Category:Opel vehicles|Movano]] [[Category:Vehicles introduced in 1997]]
